name: HammerBeard's Cookie Corner
description:
This project was realized for Brackey's Game Jam, 5th edition. The jam lasted one week, but, working on the side, only the evenings and weekends were used.

The theme was "Stronger Together", and our thinking turned to a gameplay where 5 harmless ingredients can be mixed to produce this excellent pastry that is the Cookie.

Made with Godot 3.2.3, graphic design by Gorouane.
